titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of the most illustrious Lord, the Earl of St. Albans: who departed this life the first day of this instant January, 1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for I. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur-street, without New-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Go stop the swift-wing'd moments in their flight ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in Guilt-spur-street, without New-Gate
